title: KATE 3MM ROUND CUT, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE, GOLD RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description: What was once reserved for special moments, the single-strand diamond bracelet is reimagined with individually set round-cut lab-grown white sapphires and a custom clasp to elevate your every look or complete your set if you already own the Kate necklace. Even the most discerning jewelry eye will do a double take. She was carefully designed using fine jewelry craftsmanship with a custom Dorsey clasp.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.


Setting: 4-Prong


Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire


Stone Shape: Round cut


Stone Size: 3MM


Closure: Double safety clasp





6 inches, 4.60 CTW DEW


6.5 inches, 5.10 CTW DEW


7 inches, 5.50 CTW DEW


7.5 inches, 6.00 CTW DEW


What is Lab-Grown?
